namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendRequestVoteEvent(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                uint64_t& candidateTerm,
                                uint64_t candidateId,
                                uint64_t candidateLastLogIndex,
                                uint64_t candidateLastLogTerm,
                                int& voteCount,


                                int& state) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   * retry 2
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {

      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;

      fuattr.callback = [&, candidateId, ev](Future* fu) {

        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */

        int64_t responseTerm;
        bool_t voteGranted;
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> responseTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> voteGranted;

        //is a reponse from a connected server
        if (responseTerm >= 0){
              if(voteGranted){
                  voteCount += 1;
              }else{
                if(responseTerm > candidateTerm){
                    candidateTerm = responseTerm;
                    state = FOLLOWER;
                    ev->Set(1);
                }
              }
              if (voteCount == 3) {
                  Log_info("LEADER SELECTED => ServerId : %d Total Votes : %d", candidateId, voteCount); 
                  state = LEADER;
                  ev->Set(1);
              }
        }
        /* process the RPC response here */
      };

      if(candidateId != p.first){
          Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, candidateTerm, candidateId, candidateLastLogIndex, candidateLastLogTerm, fuattr);
      }
  }
  return ev;
}


void RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(
                                  parid_t par_id,


                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  uint64_t& leaderTerm,
                                  uint64_t leaderId,
                                  int64_t& leaderCommit,
                                  std::vector<LogEntry>& logs,
                                  std::vector<int>& nextIndex,
                                  std::vector<int>& matchIndex,
                                  int& state,
                                  function<void(Marshallable &)> app_next_,
                                  int& lastApplied) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      uint64_t prevLogIndex = 0;
      uint64_t prevLogTerm = 0;
      vector<LogEntry>entries{};
      prevLogIndex = nextIndex[p.first] - 1;
      prevLogTerm = logs[prevLogIndex].term;
      for(int i=nextIndex[p.first];i<logs.size();i++){
        entries.push_back(logs[i]);
      }

      fuattr.callback = [&, leaderId, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm](Future* fu) {

        uint64_t responseTerm = 0;
        bool_t success;
        AEReply aeReply;

        uint64_t conflictIndex;
        uint64_t conflictTerm;
        int64_t serverId;
        uint64_t sizeOfEntries;

        fu->get_reply() >> responseTerm;


        fu->get_reply() >> success;
        fu->get_reply() >> aeReply;

        conflictIndex = aeReply.conflictIndex;
        conflictTerm = aeReply. conflictTerm;
        serverId = aeReply.serverId;
        sizeOfEntries = aeReply.sizeOfEntries;

        Log_info("%d APPEND ENTRIES CALLBACK => ResponseTerm %d Leader %d", serverId, responseTerm, leaderId);
        
        if (serverId >= 0){
          if(success == false){
            // FOLLOWER HAS GREATER TERM THAN LEADER, LEADER SHOULD STEP DOWN
            if(responseTerm > leaderTerm){
                leaderTerm = responseTerm;
                state = 0;
                return;
            }
            if (conflictTerm <= 0){
                // FOLLOWER HAS SHORTER LOGS THAN LEADER
                nextIndex[serverId] = conflictIndex;
                matchIndex[serverId] = nextIndex[serverId] - 1;
                Log_info("FOLLOWER LOGS < LEADER LOGS => nextIndex is now %d matchIndex is %d", nextIndex[serverId], matchIndex[serverId]);
            } else {
                // TERM CONFLICT AT PREVLOGINDEX, FIND LATEST CONFLICT TERM IN LEADER'S LOGS OR SET NEXTINDEX TO CONFLICT INDEX
                int latestConflictTermAtLeader = -1;
                for(int i=logs.size()-1;i>=0;i--){
                  if(logs[i].term == conflictTerm){
                    latestConflictTermAtLeader = i;
                    break;
                  }
                }
                nextIndex[serverId] = latestConflictTermAtLeader == -1 ? conflictIndex : latestConflictTermAtLeader;
                matchIndex[serverId] = nextIndex[serverId] - 1;
                Log_info("TERM CONFLICT AT PREVLOGINDEX => leader %d server %d new nextIndex is %d new matchIndex is %d", leaderId, serverId, nextIndex[serverId], matchIndex[serverId]);
            }
          } else if(success == true){
              //Update the matchIndex for the server
              if(prevLogIndex + sizeOfEntries > matchIndex[serverId])
                matchIndex[serverId] = prevLogIndex + sizeOfEntries;
              nextIndex[serverId] = matchIndex[serverId] + 1;
              Log_info("%d AE SUCCESS => PrevLogIndex %d SizeOfEntries %d UpdatedMatchIndex %d UpdatedNextInex %d", serverId, prevLogIndex, sizeOfEntries, matchIndex[serverId], nextIndex[serverId]);
          }
          //Figure 8 check, leader should update commit to an index which is in the current term and not previous terms
          int N = logs.size() - 1;
          for(int i=N;i>=leaderCommit;i--){
            int count = 1;
            if (logs[i].term == leaderTerm){
              for (int j=0; j<5; j++){
                if (j != leaderId && matchIndex[j] >= i){
                  count+=1;
                }
              }
            }
            if (count >= 3){
               for(int k=lastApplied+1;k<=i;k++){
                  MarshallDeputy md = logs[k].md;
                  shared_ptr<Marshallable> sp = md.sp_data_;
                  app_next_(*sp);
                }
                leaderCommit = i;
                lastApplied = leaderCommit;
                Log_info("LEADER %d COMMIT UPDATED => commit index %d lastApplied %d", leaderId, leaderCommit, lastApplied);
              break;
            }
          }
        }

      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      // MarshallDeputy md(cmd);
    if(leaderId != p.first){
      Log_info("LEADER %d SENDING APPEND ENTRY to %d => Leader term %d | Leader log size %d | Entries size is %d | LeaderCommit %d | Server NextIndex %d", leaderId, p.first, leaderTerm, logs.size(), entries.size(), leaderCommit, nextIndex[p.first]);


      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, leaderTerm, leaderId, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, entries, leaderCommit, fuattr);
    }
  }
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, const uint64_t& candidateId, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    // if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
    if(candidateId != p.first)
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    // }
  }
  return ev;
}

} // namespace janus
